faq.title: FAQs - Frequently Asked Questions
faq.p: Here you will find answers to the most common questions we receive. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact us!

items.question: I am gluten intolerant, can I ask for a dedicated plate/cutting board?
items.answer: For intolerances/allergies please inform us at the time of booking and we will create a special assortment for you.

items.question: Can I take my dog to the tasting?
items.answer: Dogs are welcome at the Wine Refuge and can accompany you during the tastings. However, they will not be able to access the cellars for the company visit.

items.question: Is there parking available in front of the Rifugio del Vino?
items.answer: We offer a large square in front of the Wine Hut where you can park your vehicles.

items.question: Can I reach you by public transport?
items.answer: The farm can be reached on line 5 from Aosta. Buses leave from the square in front of the train station, same for taxis to contact on +39 0165 262010.

items.question: Do you have a parking area for your camper?
items.answer: The company does not regulate this service. The parking area for campers is located in front of the post office of Aymavilles (Frazione Chef Lieu, 24, 11010 Aymavilles - AO).

items.question: Is the property accessible to disabled people?
items.answer: The property offers ramps for disabled people. They can visit the cellars with a lift.

items.question: Are groups allowed in?
items.answer: They are admitted upon availability of the structure. The reservation must be made well in advance (at least two weeks before the selected date).

items.question: Is there a children’s area?
items.answer: We propose a children’s space within the structure to give the little ones a moment of leisure and play during the tasting routes.

items.question: Can I take the kids to a wine tasting?
items.answer: Children can access the structure and we guarantee non-alcoholic proposals as well as the space for children.

items.question: If I have an unexpected event, can I change the day of the tasting?
items.answer: It is possible to change the day of the tasting by giving two days - no later than - notice from the selected date.

items.question: Are the tastings also suitable for vegetarians or vegans?
items.answer: The tasting of wines is free and dedicated to anyone although instead of the cutting board we will offer galettes as an accompaniment.

items.question: Is it possible to give away a tasting?
items.answer: You can give an experience to Les Crêtes with your voucher (gift certificate). Please contact us at the email address (ordini@lescretes.it) to regulate the payment of the voucher after the balance of the experience by bank transfer.

items.question: What is the maximum capacity for a tasting? Is advance booking required?
items.answer: Our structure can accommodate up to 50 people and a reservation is necessary at least two weeks in advance from the selected date.

items.question: Is it possible to ship the wines?
items.answer: It is possible to arrange a shipment by sending the request to the mail address ordini@lescretes.it.

items.question: Is it a structure that offers lunches and dinners?
items.answer: The Rifugio del Vino does not provide for the discipline of meals but offers emotional tasting experiences to which, upon request, assortments of cheeses and cold cuts can be added.
